law.catch_line: Not more than one change of venue allowed each party.
law.text: Not more than one (1) change of venue or application for a change of venue shall be allowed to any party in the same civil action.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1102.
